name: Dripped
summary: Jack is a strange character. He steals paintings from museums to eat them. He feeds himself with the artistic process of the painter. But one day, the museums are closed and he will have to paint by himself to survive.
info:
• 中文名: 滴彩
  • 上映年度: 2011
  • 片长: 9分钟
  • 官方网站: www.dripped.fr
